flawed_nl_solution:
He works 30/2=<<30/2=51>>51 days
So he works 51*12=<<51*12=612>>612 hours in the month
He got a 20*0.3=<<20*0.3=6>>6 an hour raise
So he gets paid 20+6=<<20+6=26>>26 an hour
That means he makes 26*612=<<26*612=15912>>15912

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15.0, not 51.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
